comments:
Internal Error occurred checking out as project from CVS using an Italian locale

Version: 2.0.1		(I believe this is wrong, we are built on 2.0.2)
Build id: 200211071448


The following information comes from an original defect opened against WSADIE
during our translation verification tests (TVT).


Machine Name: tvtz221a (Italian win2k Machine)

Description:
1. Open CVS Repository View
2. Right click on the view, select New > Repository Location
3. Fill in valid data on Add CVS Repository Wizard
4. On CVS Repository View expand the repository location and "HEAD"
5. Right click on a project and select Check out as project.

A generic error comes up: "Internal error occurred checking out the files".

Tester: Arturo Zitani

The following exceptions were in the .log file

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Illegal pattern character 't'
       at java.text.SimpleDateFormat.subFormat(SimpleDateFormat.java:491)

The problem is caused by an invalid string for the Console.resultTimeFormat key 
in the messages_it.properties
found in the org.eclipse.team.cvs.ui.nl1 fragment.

From the English properties file:
	Console.resultTimeFormat='(took 'm:ss.SSS')'
From the Italian properties file:
	Console.resultTimeFormat=''(took 'm\:ss.SSS')''


Here is the output from running the attached sample code to reproduce the 
problem.

Console.resultTimeFormat from properties file: ''(took 'm:ss.SSS')''
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Illegal pattern character 't'
	at java.text.SimpleDateFormat.subFormat(SimpleDateFormat.java:491)
	at java.text.SimpleDateFormat.format(SimpleDateFormat.java:424)
	at java.text.DateFormat.format(DateFormat.java:301)
	at test.Test.test(Test.java:45)
	at test.Test.main(Test.java:54)
Console.resultTimeFormat from properties file: '(took 'm:ss.SSS')'
time: (took 0:00.301)

Created an attachment (id=2729)
Sample that shows the root cause of the problem.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 28781 ***
Reopening to deal with failure case in Console.

Fix released to HEAD. Console will no longer choke on a bad format. The fix of 
the format is left to bug 28781.
